item.description:
Back by popular demand, we will again explore the tastes of Ethiopia and the benefits of communal dining. What a great way to start off the New Year--sharing a plate of new flavors with new people!

Join us for dinner at Abyssinian, which opened this past July. Be advised, however, that silverware is not used with Ethiopian cuisine. Rather, injera, a flat bread, is used as an edible utensil.

For a review in the Courant, please see: http://www.ctnow.com/....

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Ethiopian--Abyssinian in Hartford
